website_summaries.verdict: Quality set of 6 vases sit at an appealing price point.
pros: Set of 6 vases vary in size and shape
Rope detailing adds a rustic element
Clear glass has smooth, rounded edges
Vases sit at a reasonable price point despite the high quality and quantity
cons: Small openings only ideal for a few flowers

customer_reviews.title: They are adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for taking cuttings of my plants. (Pictured are daffodils and monstera vine cuttings) All of my vases are very large. But these are a great size and the hemp rope is a nice touch. They were incredibly well packaged. No chance of them breaking during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Theya

customer_reviews.title: Twine easily removed
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable little vases! I was looking for different shapes to put together and these looked perfect except for the twine (just not the look I was going for). I ordered anyway hoping it would come off. It unraveled easily when I untied it and all I had to do was pick off a small piece of glue. (Comes with 6 even though my picture just shows 4)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these as centerpieces for my wedding, along with faux flowers arranged beautifully, and string lights inside each vase. I didn't love the twine and was glad to see that it was easily removable. There's a bit of glue that came off with just my fingernails. Instead, I glued on sparkle tape, as seen in the photo. The result is spectacular!! One important factor: the vases are not all the same height and the openings vary in size. This was important in how I trimmed my flowers to fit in each one.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable ! I used them to make centerpieces at my church on thanksgiving ! Got a lot of compliments! Super well packaged and easy to storage them back in the box !
customer_reviews.author: Pink P

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Wedding
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice item as a gift. I bought it for my friend's wedding. You can put either flower or paper stars in it. it can be a very nice presentation in the banquet.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: NOT UNIQUE ))):
customer_reviews.text: Update - seller reached out and replaced the vases so I can have a complete unique set. Very quick to respond and ship out. --- Giving a three because I’m really bummed that I was given 2 pairs of 3 styles instead of 6 different, unique vases. Missing the more triangular, square, and curve-like one. It’s nice but half the vases don’t work for the type of flowers I have.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Really Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister on her birthday since she loves packaging, planting and fresh flowers and she's really in love with how they look and are created. They are really underratedly gorgeous little vases.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to place around my office area for my employees. Really nice item to place fresh cut tulips in or other flowers. Very good value for the money. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Snake Pliskin

customer_reviews.title: Great Decorative Items!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these items for my mom, as she is doing a little home decorating. They are a perfect match to her redecorating ideas. The glass vases came tightly packaged and secure. Great job with the packaging! All glass items were in one piece, and are just as described. You can't beat the value. I have seen similar vases of this size, sell for more money. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Logan

customer_reviews.title: Need product pictures with actual design shown
customer_reviews.text: I like these vases and can't wait to use them for my fall decorations, however I am frustrated that it wasn't made more clear that one of the vases as "LOVE" stamped on it. I tried to see if it was in the product pictures, and only saw one that showed the circle symbol.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 different sets of these vases. All 3 were different, but similar. I am going to use them as centerpieces at my wedding in April. I'd priced them at craft stores, but having to buy them individually and then wrap the jute myself, this was a less expensive way to go. AND, saved me time! Arrived on time and securely packaged. I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JayDee

customer_reviews.title: Cute vases!
customer_reviews.text: I used my vases to put cut flowers in. Great to put in a place where you need an extra something!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Wedgewood

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it, is a beautiful looking glass jar mad with great quality. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken F.

customer_reviews.title: i love them!
customer_reviews.text: got them a few days ago and i love these vases. beautiful with a rustic edge. i am using them for a variety of purposes - mostly holding fresh and dried flowers for around the house. packaging was very good and kept them in top shape to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great product. High quality. Amazing packaging. I see no way this could break during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: JVV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for teacher
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for teacher. Attached a Valentine’s card to each, added a few nice flowers and was easily able to transport to school. Teachers adored them!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to note!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was looking for for daughters reception centerpieces!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R.

customer_reviews.title: Great vases!
customer_reviews.text: These are great vases! Not too big, not too small and so cute. I used them for baby shower center pieces and let guests take one as a favor. Worked out great and everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Paige D

customer_reviews.title: True to photo!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy again. They are great. I mixed them with other vases I had and wow! Packing was perfect. See pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product is worth the price we paid for and delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Annetta

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love them they will be used for my baby shower
customer_reviews.author: Lanecha P.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these vases to use as table decorations for my daughter's nautical themed baby shower. They were the perfect size and looked beautiful when the flowers were added. I used baby's breath and roses (3) in each vase and they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Louise S.

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend-
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bud vases. Some openings are wider than others. Fun assortment of height and shape. The twine is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: carefully packaged, promptly delivered
customer_reviews.text: the containers will be used as vases to hold one or two flowers each as a grouping on a large serving table
customer_reviews.author: ann bishop

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set! Match well with my dinning table. Now I just need to add some flowers to make it a nice decor. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MatchMan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty vases and worked well with theme.
customer_reviews.text: Overall really liked the vases. They are a little lightweight so they blew over outside on a somewhat breezy day, recommend weights in that situation.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hoffert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and so many uses
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, I filled them with glow in the dark stones and fall flowers. I love them and use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Best For Centerpiece!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wedding and i'm really happy with it. My wedding is rustic so the jar matches with the overall theme. I used them as centerpieces and put some baby breath on it. Got lots of compliment!
customer_reviews.author: ohboooo

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, held up great in shipping. Used them for an art project.
customer_reviews.author: horse33

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product and price. Perfect for. Party I planned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not the widest
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t the widest vases but they’re beautiful. I wanted a few arrangements on my dinner table for thanksgiving and this looked beautifully on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Tringali

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: Appealing in my kitchen window. Use to keep a sprig of fresh mint and to root onion cuttings so far!
customer_reviews.author: C jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little gift of joy!
customer_reviews.text: These were wonderful. I was able to place small bouquets of flowers in them and drop them on friends doorsteps to bring some small joy during this tough time of quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Ceece

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. They came packaged so nice. The perfect size to decorate in different areas of the house for a common theme.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging for glass products and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased to see how secure the glass bottles were packaged and am thrilled with each of them. Good quality and exactly what I wanted for my bamboo plants.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glass jars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the simpleness, creative & different glass vases that came in the box
customer_reviews.author: Joeloise

customer_reviews.title: Rustic
customer_reviews.text: I used them for the Thanksgiving table, filled with eucalyptus...beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Susie-q

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really like the size.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good value but much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Selwood

customer_reviews.title: Only 5 came to me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and only 5 was delivered to me.
customer_reviews.author: KheeRa King

customer_reviews.title: Very cute vases. Love the twine accent and varying sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised. These are cute clear vases that will be perfect for water propagating indoor house plants. The twine accent is a nice touch. Good value for the quality. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: HattieNC

customer_reviews.title: Simple but Elegant.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for table center pieces for a bridal shower. Simple but elegant. Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked out for my COVID-19 converted backyard wedding! You can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sparkle Bell

customer_reviews.title: Cute and trendy!
customer_reviews.text: If you like decorating your home with lots of flowers, without spending a fortune on expensive vases, this set is trendy and reasonably-priced. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Rishina

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. They look just like the photo
customer_reviews.author: CatMom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! I little smaller than I had anticipated but nonetheless, great!
customer_reviews.author: Fiorella

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Love this, great price. I used them for a shower!
customer_reviews.author: lori a. finn-ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Vases
customer_reviews.text: We used them at a bridal shower was just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Charming little vases
customer_reviews.text: These will make charming vases for the paper flowers I plan to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great vases
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a bridal shower with tea roses and they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R

customer_reviews.title: Great centerpieces
customer_reviews.text: Great vases for center pieces and even at the house !! Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for flowers and sand decorations and they turned out great! It’s a nice variety of sizes and pretty bottles for decoration. They are study and give a great presentation. Perfect for beach house with sand.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

product_meta.title: MoonLa Glass Vases Clear Flower Bud Vase in Differing Unique Shapes Creative Rope Design - Set of 6
product_meta.description:
Warm Tips:
Only Glass Vases included, the flowers and plants not included.

Package Content:
6*Flower Vases
feature_bullets: ADORABLE 6 VASE SET - Fall in love with this collection of uniquely shaped vases in equally an equally varied range of sizes. Selected shapes and Unique design with special rope design are sure to complement any decor.

OUTSTANDING QUALITY - Our Vases crafted of high quality, blemish-free, crystal clear glass to maximize content visibility. Fine workmanship Flower Vase features thick glass walls and weighted base to ensure durability.
BREAKAGE-PROOF Package - Coming with Exquisite Gift Box and carefully wrapped in multiple layers of bubble wrap.

PERFECT FIT for office or home décor, the items also are able to be popular in wedding planning,artificial flower arranging and any special romantic events. You can fill them with various plant decorations such as flowers, branches, wheat, pearls, pebbles and other vase fillers.

100% SATISFACTION CUSTOMER SERVICE - Your satisfaction is our pursued goal, if you aren't happy with MoonLa Glass Vase for ANY reason, let us know and you will get your money back or resend, WORRY FREE!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars200 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
